english.segment1: Am I alone in here?. Am I alone in here?. Am I alone in here?. Am I alone in here?
english.segment2: Knew you were here, Sister confirmed suspicions, And beside the note, That you left on my bed, Where I held you close, Did you think I'd forget?. Couldn't be more of a mess, For to be, There used to be another way, I'd take you home.
english.segment3: Well its time to wake up, And separate feelings, That I keep falling into, Each seem like good reasons, That I feel I'm a break down, I don't care if it shows up, I'm praying this for you, Until it turns it all safe.
english.segment4: Now it seems there's a choice, Let me get with a break, Listen today, Know that never again, Will I know you that way.
english.segment5: Well its time to wake up, And separate feelings, That I keep falling into, Each seem like good reasons, That I feel I'monna break down, I don't care if it shows up, I'm praying this for you, Until it turns it all safe.
